definition: characterized by understanding based on comprehension and discernment and empathy, the capacity for rational thought or inference or discrimination
details:
adjective
- characterized by understanding based on comprehension and discernment and empathy
= example: characterized by understanding based on comprehension and discernment and empathy
noun
- the capacity for rational thought or inference or discrimination
= synonyms: intellect, reason
- the cognitive condition of someone who understands
= example: the cognitive condition of someone who understands
= synonyms: apprehension
- an inclination to support or be loyal to or to agree with an opinion
= synonyms: sympathy
- the statement (oral or written) of an exchange of promises
= synonyms: agreement
